sentences.sContent: Before applying makeup, blot the face with a tissue to remove any excess oils.
sentences.sCn: 化妆之前，用纸巾吸干脸上所有过多的油。

synos.tran: 涂污，弄脏；用吸墨纸弄干（或除去）

phrases.pCn: 完全清除（思想、记忆等）；遮盖

words.tran: 记事簿，[会计] 流水帐；吸墨纸

trans.tranCn: 吸墨水；弄上墨渍或污渍
trans.tranOther: to make a wet surface become dry by pressing soft paper or cloth on it
a mark or dirty spot on something, especially made by ink
